record.field: 1. In ___ selling salespeople will have areas or specific geographical locations assigned for them and specific accounts will also be designated.
2. Communicate the high value of services over the competition is a part of.
3. ____ the sales representative are responsible for selling the manufactured goods to the wholesale dealers as well as retail traders.
4. Present new idea to decision-makers is ____skills of sales executive.
5. Present new idea to decision-makers is ____skills of sales executive.
6. All store employees are set ____ performance standards and commit to goals.
7. ____are directed towards proposed expenditures for new projects and often require special financing.
A. a flow material from manufacturer to distributor
B. a flow of material from distributor to retailer
C. a flow of goods from retailer to consumer
D. a flow of raw materials from suppliers to manufacturers
10. ____ plays a dominant role in SCM.
11. ____ marketing is responsible for ensuring that product in distributor and reseller locations gets sold out.
12. A channel marketing manager is typically responsible for the ____ function.
15. ____ supply chains have an agenda to produce to optimize capacity and labour.
16. ____ are known as cash to cash cycle.
17. The ____ perspective involves identifying the necessary resources with which the balance may be achieved.
18. The ____ is supply chain development in which the supply chain strategy and plans for implementation are evolved.
19. Supply chains can be tremendous assets to companies and their vendors but often they come with a _____.
20. ______ has led to a greater emphasis on customer service.
21.____ is recognized as a low cost and effective method for communicating with corporate customers due to increasing cost.
22. ____ in which poor performers must make a decision themselves to either recommit themselves to perform the necessary behaviours and activities leave the company immediately.
23. Number of FTE terminations divided by the total number of FTE at the beginning of the performance period is_____.
B. Compensation cost as a percentage of revenue
24. No system of planning can be successful without having an ____ and ____ system of control.
25. Companies have implemented supply chain philosophies and tools to ensure ____ competitiveness.
26. Any party which exerts significant influence over the purchase decision is known as____.
27. In commerce, a retailer buys goods or products in large quantities from ____, either directly or through wholesalers and then sells individual items or small quantities to the general public.
28. ____ management directs and transforms a firm's resources in order to design, purchase, produce and deliver high-quality goods.
29. The ____ management approach enables a company to respond to market changes.
30. Product warranty is an element of_____.
D. External factors of the transaction
